name: MultiNotes - Handy Reminder Notes
description: This is not just ordinary Notes, it is a universal information storage!  In MultiNotes you can save not only short notes, but also much more.  You can: - Take a photo and video directly from a note and store it not in the general Gallery, but only in this application. One can attach any number of photos or videos to a note and have quick access to them. - Use the note as a voice recorder and attach sound recordings to it. - Attach any files and documents to the note and open them directly from the note.  You will not need to search for the necessary information throughout the smartphone in different applications, everything can be stored in MultiNotes and it will always be available.  You can post notes on specific topics on different boards and use different colors.  You can lock notes with a password and no one except you will be able to see the text, photos or documents in this note.  You can set a reminder for the note, and your smartphone will give alarm at the right time.  You can make lists and mark items. For example, make a shopping list before going to the store.  After all, this is a very beautiful and convenient application in a realistic style!  Whats new:  - Now for a little money, you can disable ads in the app!  - To avoid losing your notes, you can now save them to Google Drive.  - Ability to share notes via other apps (e-mail, messengers, etc.)  Waiting for feedback and suggestions!
